description:
REXONA CLINICAL ANTIPERSPIRANT AEROSOL SUMMER STRENGTH 180 ML

Everybody sweats Some of us sweat more than others In fact some of us sweat for
no real reason Its natural were all different No matter your temperature or stress levels sometimes your usual antiperspirant may not cut it Although sweating may hold you back from everyday activities its no match for our Clinical Protection Aerosol Antiperspirant Deodorant for women Rexona Clinical Protection it wont let you down

To combat heavy sweating and help you stay dry and fresh Rexona has developed breakthrough Defence Technology that creates an anti sweat micro shield to help protect you from sweat for 96 hours Our clever antiperspirant is 3x stronger versus a basic antiperspirant making it extraenduring Specially formulated to provide clinical protection when you need it most which is sometimes every day This clinical strength antiperspirant helps form a barrier against sweat for that fresh feeling no matter what

Feel unstoppable all day with our best antiperspirant spray The scent Exotic pear and pineapple draped over a heart of jasmine with traces of smooth vanilla and amber

This antiperspirant comes in an aerosol spray To apply spray it daily to clean dry underarms Unlike a basic antiperspirant theres no need to reapply

Rexona womens clinical strength sweat protection aerosol antiperspirant for women

For clinical protection this antiperspirant is 3x stronger versus a basic antiperspirant

A clinical strength antiperspirant deodorant for women with cutting edge anti sweat technology

This anti sweat antiperspirant spray provides that fresh feeling when you need it most

Thanks to Rexonas breakthrough Defence Technology this antiperspirant spray provides 96H protection against sweat

No need to reapply to fight excessive sweating.
name: Rexona Women Clinical Antiperspirant Aerosol Deodorant Summer 180ml
